trans-unit.source: (array)(Optional)associative array, support following keys: - singular (string) -- the string to translate, if omitted and empty entry will be created - plural (string) -- the plural form of the string, setting this will set $is_plural to true - translations (array) -- translations of the string and possibly -- its plural forms - context (string) -- a string differentiating two equal strings used in different contexts - translator_comments (string) -- comments left by translators - extracted_comments (string) -- comments left by developers - references (array) -- places in the code this strings is used, in relative_to_root_path/file.php:linenum form - flags (array) -- flags like php-format
trans-unit.target: （array）（可选）关联数组，支持以下键：-单数（字符串）-要转换的字符串，如果省略，将创建空条目-复数（字符串）-字符串的复数形式，将其设置将$ is_plural设置为 true-translations（array）-字符串的翻译，可能还有-其复数形式-context（string）-区分在不同上下文中使用的两个相等字符串的字符串-translator_comments（string）-注释由转换器-提取注释（字符串）-开发人员留下的注释-引用（数组）-使用此字符串的代码放置在relative_to_root_path / file.php：linenum形式-标志（array）-类似于php格式的标志

One of either $function or $extension must be provided, or they will fail by default. string $function Optional. A function name to test for the existence of. string $extension Optional. An extension to check if is loaded in PHP. bool $required Is this a required feature or not. string $fallback_for Optional. The module this module replaces as a fallback. }
trans-unit.target: （数组）要测试的模块的关联数组。array $ module {测试期间使用的模块属性的关联数组。其中任一 $function 或 $extension 必须提供，否则将默认失败。字符串$ function可选。要检查其是否存在的功能名称。字符串$ extension可选。用于检查是否在PHP中加载的扩展。bool $ required这是必需功能吗？字符串$ fallback_for可选。此模块替换为后备模块。}
